  • legion/diff - more contextual based on invoking channel, also fix potential bug with diff overlord

  • hr - correspondences/answer questions
  • overseer - white labels list agency percentage by role inflation
  • overseer - wl customers list agency percentage by role inflation

  • overseer - camp children level agency percentage by role inflation

  • locussdk/devops - re-intro Pipfile.lock or revise to use vanilla pip + setup.cfg options
  • python-curriculum/14 - explain PySpark abstraction and Spark vs PySpark (pickle/leveraging more performant runtimes/languages), why udf instead of direct python functions
  • hr - correspondences/answer questions
  • data intern - 2 comp calls
  • locussdk/devops - fix pipenv install step, include main branch for the default workflow
  • locussdk/docs - docker image local test instructions


Doing:

  • ws-problems/product - create sample solution for the backend track
  • locussdk - groom through and work on open-sourcing, with pypi distribtion
  • update/nlp - run baseline training corpus (prs/issues/dids/doings) against doc2vec/word2vec/lda models and compare performance, design shifting training window process
  • updates/nlp - incorporate with fasttext.js and dedupe actual runs
  • devops - work sample jupyter variant
  • devops - work sample airflow variant
  • devops - work sample db variant
  • nn-viz - input visualizations
  • nn-viz - classification/regression visualizations
  • builder - adapt popular times segments type with necessary changes

Did:

  • Design System - Colour schema


Doing:

  • Design System - Typography discussion
  • Feedback form - design

Did:

  • design/locus-ql - design a progress bar

  • design/locus-ql - design the query results section

Doing:

  • design/locus-ql - update ql user flow map to include new builder features
  • design - test new progress bar, tooltip, code block components in usage, graduate to Figma components library and publish to Zeplin
